song_name: Final Fantasy VI - Dancing Mad Part 2
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Final Fantasy VI - Dancing Mad Part 2 is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Final Fantasy VI - Dancing Mad Part 2 has sections analyzed in the following keys: C♯ Dorian, C♯ Minor, F Minor,  and C Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
